synopsis.text: After a mysterious awakening in the picturesque realm of Astraea, Yuuki finds himself bereft of any recollection of his past. Guided by the steadfast Kokkoro, Yuuki embarks on a journey filled with exciting encounters and delicious adventures. Alongside the ever-hungry swordswoman Pecorine and the aloof cat-eared sorceress Karyl, the foursome establishes the 'Gourmet Guild.' As they delve deeper into the wonders of Astraea, the group forges unbreakable bonds and perhaps even uncovers the enigma behind Yuuki's lost memories. Join Yuuki and his friends in this thrilling escapade, where mouthwatering delights and heartwarming camaraderie await!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
